select re.remark_id,re.re_msg, to_char(re.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reTime , FUNC_GET_USERNAME(re.creator) remarkPerson , an.answer_id,an.ans_msg ,an.creator answerPerson from T_BG_DIREMARK re left join T_BG_DIANSWER an on an.remark_id = re.remark_id and an.creator = #{answerPerson} where re.VALID_FLAG = '1'
and re.RE_MSG like '%'|| #{reMsg} ||'%'
AND to_char(re.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE '%'|| #{reTime} ||'%'

select di.remark_id, to_char(di.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reTime, di.re_msg, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(di.creator) remarkPerson, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(an.creator) answerPerson, an.ans_msg, an.answer_id from T_BG_DIREMARK di, T_BG_DIANSWER an where di.remark_id = an.remark_id and di.remark_id = #{remarkId}
